info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 4:12PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Deer Lodge, north central Silver Bow and southeastern Powell Counties through 445 PM MDT... At 412 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Anaconda, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Anaconda, Warm Springs and Opportunity. This includes Interstate 90 between mile markers 198 and 208. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
